name: Facebook Instant Articles are a Bust

content.html: Facebook's meteoric rise is a major driver for the decay of the open web. I'm hoping that there's still time to wrestle ownership of our data back from Facebook, and drive people back to the web again.
content.value: Facebook's meteoric rise is a major driver for the decay of the open web. I'm hoping that there's still time to wrestle ownership of our data back from Facebook, and drive people back to the web again.
